text: What is a WinPcap?
note: Windows Packet Capture (WinPcap) is the Windows version of the libpcap library; it includes a driver to support capturing packets.

text: WireShark was formerly known as:
note: WireShark was formerly known as Ethereal.

text: What is the name of the terminal based WireShark?
note: Tshark is a terminal based WireShark tool.

text: What is a NIC?

answers.text: Software to analyze network data packets

note: NIC stands for Network Interface Card, which is used to communicate with the devices on a network.

text: What is a MAC address?
note: An Internet gateway address is the routerâ€™s address through which you are connected to the Internet.

text: On which device can passive sniffing be done?
note: Hub is a networking device which broadcasts the entire request on all ports.

text: Which tool uses ICMP?
note: Ping is used to check connectivity of devices on a network.

text: What is ICMP?

answers.text: Messages used to check the connectivity of devices on a network

note: These messages are used by the ping utility.

text: Which of these is a MAC address?
note: It is a MAC address of a system embedded on hardware.

text: Which tools are used to sniff passwords on a network?
note: Dsniff is used to sniff passwords on a network.

text: What is the use of SSL?
note: SSL is used to encrypt information being sent between the client and the server.

text: Which tool can be used to detect ARP spoofing?
note: XARP can be used to protect against ARP spoofing.

text: On which device we can deploy port security to bind MAC addresses on ports?
note: CISCO switches (manageable) are used for port security.

text: How can you deploy secure data transmission on a network?
note: SSL stands for Secure Socket Layer which encrypts the connection between the client and the server.

text: What is a VOIP?
note: VOIP service is used to make calls using Internet connection.

text: VOIP stands for_____?
note: VOIP service is used to make phone calls using the Internet.

text: What is also known as layer 3 routing?
note: IP routing is also known as layer 3 routing.

text: When does a switch start behaving as a hub?
note: MAC flooding by an attacker will make a switch behave as a hub sending all the requests to all ports.

text: Which command is used to view the ARP cache?
note: One can view the ARP (Address Resolution Protocol) cache using -a option.

text: Which Unix tool is used to perform DNS spoofing?
note: DNS Hijacker is a Unix based DNS spoofing tool.

text: Active sniffing can be done on a LAN which has systems connected using:
note: Active sniffing is done on a network in which systems are connected using switches.

text: Which tool is used to perform a MITM attack on an SSL-protected connection?
note: SSHmitm can be used to perform MITM attacks on an SSL-protected network.
